summary: Completed comprehensive testing of enhanced payroll management system. All navbar tabs now have complete functionality including payroll processing workflow, salary management, compliance tracking, deductions calculator, leave management, loan tracking, bank advice generation, and system settings. Backend APIs are 100% functional and frontend provides end-to-end payroll management capabilities with proper Indian compliance features.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (200 OK)
Dashboard stats API with correct employee data (2 employees)
Employee CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
API error handling for non-existent resources
Dashboard quick action buttons navigation (Add Employee, Run Payroll, Generate Payslips, View Reports)
Complete sidebar navigation to all enhanced pages (Run Payroll, Salary Structure, Deductions, Compliance, Payslips, Leave & Attendance, Loans/Advances, Bank Advice, Settings)
Run Payroll multi-step workflow (Select Period → Review → Process → Complete)
Payslips generation and preview functionality with detailed breakdown
Salary Structure management with templates and employee salary editing
Deductions calculator with PF, ESI, Professional Tax calculations
Compliance management with task tracking and form generation
Leave & Attendance management with calendar and approval workflow
Loans & Advances application and tracking system
Bank Advice generation with bank-wise breakdown
Settings configuration with company, payroll, security, and UI preferences
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes (5/5 tested)
Responsive design working across desktop (1920x1080), tablet (768x1024), and mobile (390x844) viewports
Sidebar toggle functionality on mobile devices
All dashboard quick action buttons are clickable (4/4 tested)
Interactive dialogs and forms (Apply Leave, Mark Attendance, New Loan Application)
Page loading states without infinite loading issues
